dict.string: Software Developer and Computer Engineering Undergraduate Student

My interests are Mobile development, Software Engineering and Entrepreneurship. I strive to work in meaningful projects that can change people’s lives, allowing me to contribute with my knowledge while also evolving as a professional.

CocoaHeads is a group devoted to discussion of Apple Computer's Cocoa and CocoaTouch Frameworks for programming on MacOS X and iOS. As Chapter Leader of my city - Jundiaí, my main role is to organize monthly meetings, where members present their projects and offer tutorials on a great diversity of topics, including programming, good pratices, successful cases and UX & UI.

OneTune is the world's free, open music streaming platform. With OneTune, you can browse millions of cataloged songs from any artist and stream it on-demand, as well as create a personal music library on the cloud, make playlists, view lyrics to songs, and access independent, original content that's not listed on iTunes or Spotify.
Lead iOS Developer and Java Developer, developing challenging projects like self-generating algorithms, B2B applications, and communication solutions.

Student at BEPiD (Brazilian Educational Program for iOS Developers), an innovative program created in order to increase the number of highly skilled iOS Developers in Brazil, teacheing with the pedagogic approach known as CBL (Challenged Based Learning), allowing students to learn in a collaborative way working together the instructors to solve challenges.
Designer responsible for the projects of bearings, connecting rods and thrust washers of the R&D area.
Mechanical Manufacturing, Project and Tool-making Technician (Post High School)

array.string: Experience in programming languages such as Objective C, Java and Javascript.
Learning how to code in Swift, Python and Ruby.
Experience in Software Development, Design Patterns and Software Architecture.
Experience in Agile Software Development methodologies.
Experience with Apllication Servers like Wildfly, Jetty and Glassfish
Experience with Relational Databases, SQL, NoSQL and PL/SQL.

dict.string: Ludwig is an ongoing iOS accessibility project, started inside BEPiD, that aims to introduce de music world to hearing impaired people and, in the future, also teach music to them. For achieving this result, the application works with colors and vibrations - using an external hardware.
OneTune is a music streaming application.

FeelSound is an ongoing iOS accessibility project, for my college term paper, with the objective of identifying sound patterns, using the device's microphone, helping hearing impaired people to identify doorbells, sirens and other important sounds through different vibration patterns - using an external hardware.

Tá na Cara! is an amazing guessing game, that requires at least 2 people to play. One person stays with the device on the forehead, with the screen side to the other person, that have to give hints about the word that showed up. Fun garanteed!

English for Kids is an educational app, that intends to introduce english for kids up to 5 years old, looking forward to stimulate and develop language skills through a friendly and intuitive interface full of drawings, sounds and animations.
